short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track Amazon product prices and check for price changes on selected items in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Amazon Product Price Tracker - Simplify Your Price Tracking

This free chrome extension helps Amazon sellers efficiently track and monitor product prices in real-time. With manual price tracking, you have full control over which products to monitor and when, allowing you to stay competitive and organized without the hassle of automated processes.

🎯 Features & Your Benefits:

🔍 Manual Price Check for Full Control: Instantly track the price of a product on Amazon by manually initiating the price check. 

📊 Real-Time Price Tracking: Access the current product price instantly and store it for future reference, enabling you to analyze price trends over time. 

📋 Personal Dashboard & Notes: Organize all tracked product prices in a central dashboard and add personal notes to each product to keep track of important details. 

📂 CSV Export: Export all tracked product price data with one click into a CSV file for easy management and analysis. 

🔎 Detailed Price History: Track the price history of multiple products over time, complete with timestamps to provide a comprehensive view of historical pricing trends. 

🔐 Privacy First: All of your tracked data remains private. We don't save any of your research data on our servers!

🖥️ Seamless Browser Integration: Install the extension directly into your browser and track prices without leaving your Amazon session.

🎁 Completely Free to Use: Enjoy all the features without any cost – no hidden fees.

Disclaimer: This extension is developed independently and is not affiliated with Amazon or any of its associated companies. The software may occasionally contain errors. Please use the data as a guideline and verify critical information independently. A free license key is required to activate and use the extension.
